definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: In recent years, it has been more serious of marriage crisis in migrant family.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，农民工家庭发生婚变的问题日趋严重。

sentences.english: Harlem Yu denies rumors about their marriage and said that he and Annie didn't separate or divorce.
sentences.chinese: 庾澄庆否认婚变传言，称与伊能静未分居未离婚。

sentences.english: Two person of change of marital status hearsays are no wonder noisier are fiercer.
sentences.chinese: 难怪二人的婚变传闻越闹越烈。

sentences.english: The famous star's divorce was not known to the public until one year later.
sentences.chinese: 这位明星婚变的消息一年之后才被公开。

definition: derailment (railway accident)/to leave the rails/fig. to overstep bounds/fig. to have an extramarital affair
loss of love/breakup of a relationship
domestic violence/abbr. for 家庭暴力[jia1 ting2 bao4 li4]
to squeeze in/to step in/to take part/to step between (two persons in a relationship)
marriage arranged following a pregnancy/marriage necessitated by an unplanned pregnancy
to marry for the second time/second marriage/second spouse
to leave a marriage with nothing (no possessions or property)
